name: Magic Fruit & Nut Ice Cream
description: Rich & Creamy Magic Fruit & Nut ice cream is a dairy ice cream made from 100% Sri Lankan, Fresh Cow's milk and Finest fruits & nuts. Suitable for Vegetarians. Rs.50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education.       *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
